extension.name: OPC Theme - Sandwitch CSS3
extension.author: RuposTel.com
extension.description: Sandwitch theme can show different tabs for business or visitor logic. It is fully responsive.

param.name: show_business
param.label: Show business tab
param.description: Will hide business tab from anonymous users and rename the tab for logged in users.

param.name: logged_in_tab
param.label: Tab name for logged in users
param.description: Choose a language string or a specific text to show for the logged in tab.
